pages.text: When equipping multiple artifacts from the same set, set effect will activate and provide extra buffs that trigger when certain conditions are met.$(br2)You can activate multiple set effects from one sets or different sets. The activated effect will be shown in tooltip, as well as the Set Effect page in your inventory tabs.

The rank of set effect activated is determined by the lowest rank artifact that is necessary to trigger this effect.$(br2)Hold shift, and then you can check the tooltip of the artifact of corresponding rank to know the exact effect of such rank for this artifact set.$(br2)Green set effect tooltip means set effect triggered, while grey tooltip means effect not triggered. Sometimes the effect is triggered bur for a lower rank, then the tooltip will also be grey.
